attributes.action: No Covid-19 questions to be used on any Future Assurance/insurance Policies.
attributes.additional_details: With genetics and sequencing in the future, data collected now could provide certain institutions with valuable tools. This data was offered and allowed to be collected solely to stop the Pandemic and not to be used against it's Citizens in any future scenario. I.e..., in the future it is found that the children of certain people who suffer greatly from Covid will be susceptible to.........? Or ..........? All Covid-19 data not to be used as a hinderance for future generations.
attributes.background: Ensure that the liberties of its citizens and future generations are not profited on by Health/Insurance/Govt etc.., due to the UK's Citizens volunteering and willingness to help and provide data that could be used against them

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
